decrypt.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to change a message or information on a computer back into a form that can be read, when someone has sent it to you in a type of computer code
decrypt.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Only certain employees will be able to decrypt sensitive documents.
decrypt.translation[1].definitions[0].de: to change a message or information that was written in computer code back into a form that can be read and understood by everyone
decrypt.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: Only key employees will be allowed to decrypt sensitive documents.
